titles.title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on formulations containing Bromacil and Diuron and application adjuvants.
To extend the temporary suspension of duty on formulations containing Bromacil and Diuron and application adjuvants.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on formulations containing Bromacil and Diuron and application adjuvants.
